mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plans (user_no, title, description, start_at, end_at) VALUES(#{userNo}, #{title}, #{description}, #{startAt}, #{endAt});
mapper.select: SELECT pd.plan_no, pd.destination_no, pd.destination_order, pd.visit_date, pd.memo, a.attraction_no, a.title, ct.content_type_name, a.first_image1, a.addr1, a.latitude, a.longitude FROM plan_destinations pd JOIN attractions a ON pd.attraction_no = a.attraction_no JOIN contenttypes ct ON a.content_type_id = ct.content_type_id WHERE pd.plan_no = #{planNo} ORDER BY pd.destination_order;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plan_destinations ( attraction_no, plan_no, visit_date, destination_order, memo ) VALUES ( #{attractionNo}, #{planNo}, #{visitDate}, #{destinationOrder}, #{memo} )
